Detailed Description

Replacement for wxTimer as it doesn't work on non-X builds.

Member Function Documentation

bool CTimer::Start ( int  millisecs,
bool  oneShot = false 
)

Starts the timer.

Parameters:
millisecs The frequency of events.
oneShot Specifies if only one event should be produced.

References CMuleThread::Stop(), and Stop().

Referenced by CSearchList::LocalSearchEnd().

void CTimer::Stop (  ) 

Stops the timer.

Note that this does not delete the actual thread immediatly, but no new events will be queued after calling this function.

References CMuleThread::Stop().
